citation: "Sen. John McCain's Full Speech to the RNC." YouTube, uploaded by CBS News, 4 Sept. 2008, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PK-HFCId8_M.
label: Sen. John McCain's full speech to the RNC

description.text: Objective Statement: The objective of this project is to conduct a comprehensive analysis of the rhetorical strategies, actions, and language used by then, Senator of Arizona John McCain and other speakers at the 2008 Republican National Convention during McCain's presidential nomination acceptance speech. This analysis will focus on identifying key literary devices, audience reactions, and thematic elements, with the aim of drawing connections between the audio content and the eventual election outcomes.
